medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began less than one day prior to presentation. Patient was hypotensive with a concerning abdominal exam at transfer, presenting with confusion and complaints of abdominal pain. No nausea or vomiting reported.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of ESRD, CAD, aortic stenosis, atrial fibrillation on Coumadin, chronic renal insufficiency (CRI), hypertension (HTN), prior exploratory laparotomy, and knee replacements.
medical_history.family_history: Father died from lung cancer; mother died from 'old age.'
